name: Dilly Honey Mustard Chicken Strips
description: Crispy perfection (thanks to Crispy & Crunchy Coating Mix) awaits with these dill honey mustard coated chicken strips, ready for either air frying or baking in the oven. Serve them up with a generous side of extra dressing for the ultimate dunking experience. Kids and adults alike will love 'em.
preparation: Meanwhile, in a bowl, add chicken and dressing; toss to coat.
Place coating mix and dressing mix in a shallow dish; gently mix to combine. Using tongs or your hands, add chicken one piece at a time, rotating and pressing mix on both sides of chicken to coat.
Place chicken in single layer in basket, leaving some space between each piece. You may have to do this in 2 batches depending on the size of your air fryer.
Cook 8–10 min, flipping halfway through using tongs, or until golden and cooked through.
tips: To make these in the oven, place two Cooling Racks on Sheet Pan lined with Sheet Pan Liner. Lightly brush racks with oil to prevent sticking. Place prepared chicken on racks, leaving some space between each piece. Bake 18–20 min in preheated 425° F oven, or until golden and cooked through.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 2 cups leafy greens, 1 tbsp Epicure Dressing, and 1⁄2 cup cooked grains.

products.name: Dilly Honey Mustard Dressing Mix
summary: Sure to be a hit at your next get-together, this is one of those so-good-you-keep-making-it dressings that will have everyone asking for the recipe. Dairy-free yet super creamy, this one hits you with a whole lot of dill flavour, a touch of honey, and a slight tang from apple cider vinegar.

products.name: Crispy & Crunchy Coating (Pkg of 3)
summary: Craving the crunch? Add a crispy gluten free coating – that’s never soggy or bland – to protein and veggies and bake them in the oven. You’ll get all the taste of your fave fried foods without a trace of greasiness, so you can enjoy them whenever the craving strikes!

products.name: Sheet Pan
summary: Lightweight all-purpose baking sheet made from a single piece of aluminum, with a one-inch rim.

products.name: Sheet Pan Liner
summary: Nonstick silicone baking sheet. Ideal for baking, roasting, sheet pan meals & more!

products.name: Cooling Rack (Set of 2)
summary: These space-saving cooling racks are an absolute must-have for every at-home baker or chef.
